attributes.action: Allow Greater Manchester's transport infrastructure to be controlled by a council-based company like Transport for London
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Transport for London has made an excellent success of transport in the Greater London area - surely it is about time this is extended to other major English cities including Manchester.  The private companies involved in running buses, trains and trams in Greater Manchester have consistently offered poor value for money year in year out, and now is the time to make transport more accountable, for the people of Greater Manchester
